env.NEXT_PUBLIC_PRODUCT_HUNT_AUTH_TOKEN: put your producthunt auth token here
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY: put your firebase api key here
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN: put your firebase auth domain here
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_DATABASE_URL: put your firebase database url here
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID: put your firebase project ID here
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET: put your firebase storage bucket here
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID: put your firebase message sender ID here
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID: put your firebase app ID here
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID: put your firebase measurement ID here
